data.comment: The match has started at London Stadium.
Throw-in for West Ham in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 1, Can West Ham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Aston Villa's half?
Tomas Soucek (West Ham) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 2, Goal! A Angelo Ogbonna header gives West Ham a 1-0 lead in London.
Jarrod Bowen instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 4, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Peter Bankes awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Peter Bankes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Ollie Watkins of Aston Villa is pulled up for offside.
West Ham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Peter Bankes signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Aston Villa to take a throw-in in West Ham territory.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Throw-in West Ham.
Trezeguet (Aston Villa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 19, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Ezri Konsa's header is off-target for Aston Villa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Can West Ham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 23, In London Aston Villa drive forward through Conor Hourihane. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of West Ham.
Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Jack Grealish.
In the minute 25, Great play from Matty Cash to set up the goal.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Peter Bankes awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Peter Bankes signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In London West Ham attack through Vladimir Coufal. The finish is off target, however.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 35, Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
Throw-in West Ham.
Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 37, Peter Bankes awards West Ham a goal kick.
West Ham to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Free kick Aston Villa.
In the minute 42, Aston Villa drive upfield and John McGinn gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a West Ham defender.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Conor Hourihane of Aston Villa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In London, Jarrod Bowen of West Ham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, West Ham have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Peter Bankes will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Aston Villa have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at London Stadium.
The second-half is now underway.
The home team replace Michail Antonio with Sebastian Haller.
In the minute 46, Said Benrahma is on a sub for Arthur Masuaku for West Ham.
West Ham's Jarrod Bowen scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Said Benrahma.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for West Ham at London Stadium.
West Ham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Ham's half?
In the minute 48, Important block from the West Ham defence as John McGinn fires in a strike for Aston Villa.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Jack Grealish for Aston Villa is whistled offside.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of West Ham.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to West Ham in their own half.
West Ham's Pablo Fornals has been booked in London.
In the minute 55, Said Benrahma (West Ham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
In the minute 57, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Free kick Aston Villa.
Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
In the minute 60, West Ham's Sebastian Haller has run offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to West Ham.
In the minute 63, Aston Villa drives forward and Trezeguet gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 65, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Ezri Konsa of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Aston Villa attack but Ollie Watkins's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Free kick for West Ham in the half of Aston Villa.
Matty Cash (Aston Villa) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 68, West Ham needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Peter Bankes.
Ollie Watkins (Aston Villa) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a West Ham goal kick.
Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
An attacking Aston Villa player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 73, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Trezeguet.
Peter Bankes awards Aston Villa a penalty but Ollie Watkins misses from 12 yards.
Aston Villa make their first substitution with Bertrand Traore replacing Conor Hourihane.
In the minute 75, Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Peter Bankes awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Trezeguet, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Anwar El Ghazi is the substitute for Aston Villa.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Free kick Aston Villa.
Peter Bankes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, David Moyes is making the team's third substitution at London Stadium with Mark Noble replacing Jarrod Bowen.
Peter Bankes signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Peter Bankes signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Throw-in for West Ham in their own half.
Peter Bankes signals a throw-in for Aston Villa, close to West Ham's area.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as West Ham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of West Ham.
Aston Villa's Jack Grealish gets in a shot but it is blocked by a West Ham defender.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
The away team have replaced Matty Cash with Ahmed Elmohamady. This is the third substitution made today by Dean Smith.
Bertrand Traore gets his shot on target but fails to score for Aston Villa.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
At London Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Peter Bankes blows against Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins for offside.
Peter Bankes signals a Aston Villa throw-in in West Ham's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Aston Villa in London.
Goal kick for West Ham at London Stadium.
Throw-in for Aston Villa at London Stadium.
The match has come to a close in London. The final score is 2-1.
